name: The Die Must Die
description:
HOW TO PLAY PLEASE READ:

1. After you roll the die, the number that shows up on the die is the number of enemies that will appear

2. Move (WASD) and Shoot (Left Click) the die to decrease its health and avoid or shoot the monsters

3. once the die is at zero health, the number that is shown on the die cannot be rolled again

3. see what numbers the die can roll on the top left

4. once the die can't roll any more numbers, you beat the level

Note: 

I made this in one and a half days and I basically Speedrun it so there is a lot of bugs.

Download My Mobile game: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.MOOOKSGames.ShootShot
